journey.title: Delhi Journey
journey.content: Delhi, heart of India, beautiful bazaars etc.

episodes.title: India’s Dying Island (Gone by 2030?) Ghoramara, West Bengal
episodes.description: A look at Ghoramara Island in West Bengal, which is reportedly disappearing and may be submerged by 2030.

episodes.title: Why Tibetans Live in Chhattisgarh? The Story of Tibetans in Mainpat
episodes.description: Exploring the history and lives of the Tibetan community settled in Mainpat, Chhattisgarh.

episodes.title: Hidden "Naxal Island" in Chhattisgarh| TRUTH or LIE?
episodes.description: An investigation into the mystery of the "Naxal Island" in Chhattisgarh to uncover the reality of the area.

episodes.title: NO ROAD, NO BRIDGE: India’s Most FORGOTTEN Village| Chhattisgarh Reality
episodes.description: A documentation of the survival struggles in a remote Chhattisgarh village that lacks basic infrastructure like roads and bridges.

episodes.title: Hitchhiking in Red Zone of Chhattisgarh- Villagers Helped me Here
episodes.description: An account of hitchhiking through the "Red Zone" of Chhattisgarh and the unexpected hospitality of the local villagers.

blog.title: Finding Balance
blog.summary: Reflections on walking the path between two worlds...
